verses.verse: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H4427>reigneth<s%>; let the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H7264>tremble<s%>: He <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> above the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%>; let the <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H5120>moved<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; And he is <S%H7311>high<s%> above all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>.
Let them <S%H3034>praise<s%> thy <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>: Holy is <S%H6918>he<s%>.

The <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5797>strength<s%> also <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%>; Thou dost <S%H3559>establish<s%> <S%H4339>equity<s%>; Thou <S%H6213>executest<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
Exalt <S%H7311><s%> ye <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, And <S%H7812>worship<s%> at his <S%H7272>footstool<s%>: Holy is <S%H6918>he<s%>.

Moses <S%H4872><s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> among his <S%H3548>priests<s%>, And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> among them that <S%H7121>call<s%> upon his <S%H8034>name<s%>; They <S%H7121>called<s%> upon <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and he answered <S%H6030>them<s%>.
He <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto them in the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud<s%>: They <S%H8104>kept<s%> his <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>, And the <S%H2706>statute<s%> that he gave <S%H5414>them<s%>.

Thou <S%H6030>answeredst<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>, O Jehovah our <S%H430>God<s%>: Thou wast a <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H5375>forgavest<s%> <S%H5358>them<s%>, Though thou tookest vengeance of their <S%H5949>doings<s%>.

Exalt <S%H7311><s%> ye <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, And <S%H7812>worship<s%> at his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%>; For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H6918>holy<s%>.
